mapper.select: select * from ELE_S_MENU a where a.rs=1 and a.parentid='00' and rownum <2

select t.menu_id , t.name , t.url, t.remarks, t.parentid,p.name pName from ELE_S_MENU t left join ELE_S_MENU p on t.parentid=p.menu_id where t.rs=1
and (t.parentid=#{menu_id} or t.menu_id=#{menu_id})
order by t.parentid

select count(1) from ELE_S_MENU t left join ELE_S_MENU p on t.parentid=p.menu_id where t.rs=1
and (t.parentid=#{menu_id} or t.menu_id=#{menu_id})
order by t.parentid
